idea:
Employment generation

SPRABHU LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your generator (DG sets) / cars/fleet vehicles etc. in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. You can place your order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to your chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter! When everything in the world is available online, we are coming with providing online home delivery of fuel. This will helps to generate the employment opportunity and creates the job opportunity.
name: SPRABHU LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Soleify is a shoe cushioning brand that aims to add comfort to consumers lives without compromising style.

At Soleify we innovate cushioning solutions for a range of problems including fit issues, blisters due to narrow shoes or foot ache due to wearing heels for prolonged periods of time.
name: Soleify

idea: PHYTOATOMY PRIVATE LIMITED is a Technology based E-Commerce portal which markets and distributes products catering to Health Care, Beauty Care, Personal Care and Home Care which are indigenously manufactured by our Small and Medium Enterprises across global platform through our affiliate marketing program and Independent Business Owners (IBOs).
name: PHYTOATOMY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: At Nirmooha, we blend improved combinations of classic embroideries with modern silhouettes where inspiration belongs with the global culture involving signature embellishments of MOP, wooden beads and 3D flowers detailed through painstaking craftsmanship with the skills of experienced Indian artisans.
name: NIRMOHA FASHION HOUSE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: ELCARE _ Care With Nature (A Brand of ELCUR PRIVATE LIMITED); In the current fast and dynamic lifestyle, there is nothing like grooming and self-care; However, the choices when it comes to choosing suitable skincare products are either lack of clarity about the product ingredients or popular brands are charging a high premium. In July 2020, Beauty & Skincare brand "ELCARE – Care With Nature" was envisioned by the mother & daughter duo (Mithilesh Mishra & Vandana Tewari) bootstrapped by Saroj K Mishra and mentored by IIM Lucknow Alumni, to make a difference in the beauty & skincare industry by justifying the perfect balance between the need to take care of oneself and the need to care for the society with its 100% natural skincare SERUMS. At ELCARE – A Beauty brand specific to SERUMs, it is our aim to grow into a national entity with a presence in every single state, bringing our assurance of quality to every consumer - focussed on achieving maximum customer satisfaction. We have launched 11 products in 3 segments: A. SERUMS (6 products) - 100% natural with maximum organic content (PH <= 5.5 with ZERO Synthetic Fragrance) B. Beauty Tools (2 products) - 100% Natural Indian Stone C. Essential Oil (3 products) - 100% Pure & organic Our products standard can be assured; as we adhere to compliance (certified) with the standards laid out by ORGANIC, KOSHER, WHO-GMP, and ISO-IAF 9001-2015.s.
name: ELCUR PRIVATE LIMITED (ELCARE)

idea:
Glam Camp is a camping company which thrives in making the camping experience luxurious. We at Glam Camp are here to promote Agro tourism by giving the tourist the best of the experiences of coastal Maharashtra and it's lush green agriculture. We also thrive to promote rural employment for the residents of Palghar taluka.

We look forward to enhance the Agro tourism of the state of Maharashtra by bringing a new concept of camping made luxurious which is built on our belief of go eco-friendly.
name: GLAMCAMP (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
DefSpace is India’s first global e-commerce platform for Defence and Space,
connecting businesses and individuals at the click of a button.
DefSpace is a marketplace for Startups, SMEs, Large Enterprises as well as for individuals to reach out to global pool of users, manufacturers, developers and service providers.
name: DEFSPACE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
